data.actual_result: Instead of the default server icon the discord logo appears
data.expected_result: Depending upon the name of the server, the server icon in the window should be the default one with some text.
data.short_description: Server icon not present while joining a server with the default icon
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the "+" at the bottom of the server list - Hit "Create a new server" and without setting a server icon create a new server - Create and copy a new invite link to this server - Click the "+" at the bottom of the server list and click "join a server with invite link" - Paste the link and click join on top right - Observe the new window that pops up showing the number of online and offline people along with an option to join the server
